title: Thank you for all your hard work
body:
I would like to thank the technical/support team [as i think noone likes to say nice things to supports in general ingame, or out].

So a warm and fuzzy thank you to all you wonderful hard-working unspoken heroes of fixing the hextechnically wrong stuff, for all the things that get a bit out of whack would not be fixed anywhere near as quickly if not for you all.
Also on a side note, I would like to thank Templar Iytsuna, personally, for getting around to my ticket so quickly, YOU ROCK

Hope you get some rest after all the new patch business,
Thanks again, Merry Christmas and a happy new year,
Aellic
